body: If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me
DISTANCE is listed for COMIC ExE 19. Releasing on May 25, 2019.
The only new thing from takayaKi are those "secret sketches", one of which features the mom, Yurie. Hopefully, this means the artist will make a special featuring her.
Complete fail for 2 editions in a row with no distance.
Nothing new from Takayaki. Damn you

Who are Artists of Page from 624 to Last page ?
Hizuki akira made them fuck already damnit!!!
